localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
blogPost.body: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
blogPost.title: Digital Stocking Stuffers - $1 or less digital products
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。
下載各種可以通過電子郵件發送給朋友和家人的好東西。不要在商場裏閒逛，滾動清單。呆在家裏，把你的禮物通過電子郵件寄給你最喜歡的自助者、自助者和獨立黑客，這樣可以拯救生命。

previous.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
previous.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。

next.title:
Job postings are like:

"Please upload your CV as a file"

"Okay, now please type out into boxes all the things you just sent us in your CV" https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u

localize.full_text:
招聘信息是这样的

"请将你的简历以文件形式上传"

"好的，现在请把你刚才发给我们的简历中的所有内容都打出框来 "https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u。

招聘信息是這樣的

"請將你的簡歷以文件形式上傳"

"好的，現在請把你剛纔發給我們的簡歷中的所有內容都打出框來 "https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u。
